name: Spirit Gardener
description:
Spirit Gardener Welcome, Fledgling~!

Your goal is to grow a variety of plants in order to hone your Spirit Gardening prowess and graduate from a Fledgling Student into a real Spirit Gardener! Harvest plants for fruits or siphon them for essences - harvesting gives more points, but both are important!

Goal
  • Obtain 200 points through Harvesting and Siphoning fully grown plants.

Note: Other stats such as "Turns Taken" and "Number of Exchanges" are also tracked, in case you want to challenge yourself to complete the game in a certain number of those as well~

Main Controls
  • Click tiles on the field to see actions you can perform.
  • Click the Inventory button on the left side of the screen to swap to the Exchange menu.
  • Click an Exchange Item to see the items required, then press the Confirm Exchange button to add the item(s) to your Inventory!
Other Controls
  • Press R to reset the game.
